abstract: Google’s new page about the Australian election shows a new approach to publishing: a mix of human- and machine-selected information.
snippet: Google’s new page about the Australian election shows a new approach to publishing: a mix of human- and machine-selected information.
lead_paragraph: We should be past the debate of a few years ago about whether Google wants to be a “portal”—in the sense that Yahoo and AOL offer sections after sections about various topics. After all, for many sites Google is an even bigger front door than their own home pages.

headline.main: Google as Portal, With a Twist
